articles.title: GoPro Launches Revamped Quik App, No Action Camera Required - Digital Trends
articles.description: GoPro's new Quik app lets you transform photos and footage from your smartphone or action camera into entertaining highlight videos.
articles.content:
GoPro has launched a revamped version of its Quik app that folks without one of its action cameras can also use.
The original Quik app landed in 2016 but has been neglected by GoPro for a while now.… [+2851 chars]
